comment: It's strange she's so scared of this, since its never happened. How do I know it hasn't happened? Because it would have been the top news story on every network for weeks, and Emma would still be appearing on every daytime chat show crying about it.
amr:
# ::snt It's strange she's so scared of this, since its never happened. How do I know it hasn't happened? Because it would have been the top news story on every network for weeks, and Emma would still be appearing on every daytime chat show crying about it.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / strange
            :domain (s2 / scare-01
                  :ARG0 (t / this)
                  :ARG1 (s3 / she)
                  :degree (s4 / so)
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (h / have-polarity-91
                              :ARG1 t
                              :ARG2 -
                              :time (e / ever)))))
      :snt2 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (s5 / story
                        :topic (n / news)
                        :domain (ii / it)
                        :location (n2 / network
                              :mod (e2 / every))
                        :duration (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (w / week))))
                  :op2 (a2 / appear-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Emma")
                              :ARG0-of (c3 / cry-02
                                    :ARG1 (ii2 / it)))
                        :medium (s6 / show-04
                              :ARG1 (c4 / chat-01)
                              :time (d / date-entity
                                    :dayperiod (d2 / daytime))
                              :mod (e3 / every))
                        :mod (s7 / still)))
            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :manner (a3 / amr-unknown))))
